Package com.mygdx.game

package com.mygdx.game
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Grill
    Designed for any station that can be used to grill items.
    HotIngredient
    Inherits ingredient class but allow for cooking operations as well.
    InfoScreen
    User can see the ingredients and recipes they have.
    Ingredient
    Base ingredient class where items can not be cooked.
    InstructionScreen
    Loads a jpeg which acts as the instruction - not an interactable screen.
    MainMenu
    Plays video on Launch.
    Map
    Main game screen which enables the user to control the map.
    PiazzaPanicGame
    Base class for all operating systems.
    Recipe
    Data structure to hold all recipes.
